Sentencas: The present study evaluates the performance of a poly -generation system applied to commercial buildings.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: An internal combustion engine (ICE) and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) used as prime movers represent different efficiency distributions according to part load ratio variation.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: Accordingly, discrete results are found in terms of energy, environment, and economy depending on the prime mover type applied to each building.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: A renewable energy system is combined with the poly -generation system, and the outputs produced from the energy generation units are transferred to the energy storage system and supplied to the demand sources.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: Through the parametric study and hybrid control method, the stored energy is optimally distributed to the cooling and heating system to maximize the primary energy saving ratio.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: The major components constituting the polygeneration system are modeled and validated based on experiments and literature to enhance the reliability of the dynamic simulation model.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: The monthly amounts of replenished and wasted energy are examined, and the magnitude of produced energy contribution to the building self-sufficiency ratio is also identified.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: When ICE- and SOFC-based poly -generations are applied to the hospital, 30.2% and 45.2% of the primary energy consumption is saved, respectively, compared with the conventional system.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: For the office, the corresponding systems reduce primary energy consumption by 1.8% and 37.2%, respectively.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types

Sentencas: The economic feasibility of the poly -generation systems is examined considering the current energy project in South Korea.
Titulo: Multi-criteria evaluation of poly-generation system applied to commercial buildings with various prime movers and building types
